A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. I liked it\, but the kind of like that can wait until it comes out on DVD. Some of the humor seemed misplaced in the film\, like the timing of when they decided to add humor was off. For those of us who have been watching the movie since 1977...the writing for the original characters was definitely off\, It was like Luke was a completely different character. I’m not a big Star Wars fanatic but just someone who has watched and enjoyed them since they first came out. And I didn’t hate it. I was just disappointed.
